Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Includes spirit-based ready-to-drink cocktails in the definition of beverage and includes ready-to-drink cocktail containers under the state's bottle deposit system
Summary: Adds spirit-based ready-to-drink cocktails to the definition of beverage; includes ready-to-drink cocktail containers in the state bottle deposit incentive program.
LawCode: Amd §3, ABC L; amd §27-1003, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to including spirit-based ready-to-drink cocktails in the definition of beverage; and to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to including ready-to-drink cocktail containers under the state's bottle deposit system
